sections.heading: Establishment
sections.text: by counties of agricultural demonstration farms and plots authorized; purposes.

sections.heading: Demonstration
sections.text:
farms or plots to be marked and open to public inspection; liability of

visitors.

sections.heading: Resolution
sections.text: to pay owner, lessee or manager of demonstration farm or plot; amount of payments.

sections.heading: State
sections.text:
to pay one-half of subsidy for demonstration farms or plots; legislative

appropriations.

sections.heading: Annual
sections.text: report of results of demonstration; distribution free of charge.
